PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-06291998-04-230FIN,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS by expanding on the kind of investments that can be made with the funds in a Registered Retirement Saving Plan (RRSP) or Income Fund (RRIF) or in a Deferred Profit Sharing Plan, to include debts issued by a mutual fund trust as well as rights to a share in the capital stock of a corporation.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1998-0250 Publication Date: 1998-05-13
Attachments
precis:
Regulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS by expanding on the kind of
investments that can be made with the funds in a Registered Retirement
Saving Plan (RRSP) or Income Fund (RRIF) or in a Deferred Profit Sharing
Plan, to include debts issued by a mutual fund trust as well as rights to
a share in the capital stock of a corporation.
